title: Time Belong Ghost: A steampunk tale in ancient Papua New Guinea
description: It is the time belong the tumbuna - the time of the ancestors. In the ancient tropical forest, the River Tribe find two of their own, dead. They know that a shining giant has crossed into their lands.They send for a hunter from Big Village, but the young man who travels the wide river to help is not quite what they expect. He is on the run and calls himself Painted Fox. With him, comes his old and ragged dog, UkanDooAh. There are ghost tattoos on the hunters that follow, and Painted Fox must take the village girl, Atepe, and run.If he is going to survive, he will need her much more than she needs him.'Steampunk in the rainforest. An engrossing tale of bravery and honour set against the backdrop of Papua New Guinea. A real page-turner.' Maple Moore - Dogbed Books.'A totally unique setting, memorable characters and a killer story. Bang on.' Kanage, Port Moresby Review.
author: Robyn Goodmanham
